title: rustdoc crashes parsing yet another strange doc-comment on 1.37
body:
I had a similar issue on 1.36 that seemed to have been fixed: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/62571

That fix looks like it went into 1.37, but I'm getting a crash running on a similar doc comment once again.

Here is the offending doc-comment
```
#[doc = " |  _ \\ __ _ _ __ ___  ___  | |__   __ _ ___  ___  |  _ \\| \\ | | | (_)___| |_"]
#[doc = " | |_) / _` | \'__/ __|/ _ \\ | \'_ \\ / _` / __|/ _ \\ | | | |  \\| | | | / __| __|"]
#[doc = " |  __/ (_| | |  \\__ \\  __/ | |_) | (_| \\__ \\  __/ | |_| | |\\  | | | \\__ \\ |_"]
```

And here is the backtrace
```

stack backtrace:
```
